title: Perianal bronchogenic cyst: a report of two cases.
abstract: Cutaneous presentations of bronchogenic cysts are rare in all age groups, particularly in adults. Previous reports showed that cutaneous manifestations of bronchogenic cysts were frequently presented above abdominal region. Here we present two cases of a perianal bronchogenic cyst. To the best to our knowledge, this is the first report of a bronchogenic cyst in this area.
categories: Congenital Hereditary and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
